ShortDescription.Value: Post office fixes, tweaks, and capacity controls.

Publish.LongDescription:
## Magic Mail [MM]
- Mail System Control of post offices, sorting facilities, and post-vans. - All sliders and toggles are optional and can be reset to game defaults (vanilla) or to a recommended quick-start preset. - MM also provides some 'magic' fixes for issues with the mail system (until they are fixed by CO)
### Features
- Quick Start Button - 1-Click, just set it and forget it to apply the recommended defaults. - Adjust **post-van mail load**, **post-van fleet size**, and **post-truck fleet size**. - Boost **sorting speed** and **sorting storage capacity** for sorting facilities. - **Fix low amount** of Local mail at post offices by "magically" topping up Local Mail when storage drops below a certain amount (you can choose). - **Fix low Unsorted mail** at sorting facilities to keep the sorting active. - **Fix mail overflow** by trimming overfilled mail buffers at post offices and sorting facilities so they do not remain blocked forever. - Show simple city-wide mail statistics and recent activity in the options UI.
### 5 Languages
- Français French, Deutsch German, Español Spanish, - English, 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese)
### Compatibility - Safe to remove at any time; postal facilities will fall back to the game's default. - Does not use Harmony or Reflection, less likely to break with game updates.
### Support and Feedback - If the mod helps you, give it a Like :) - Report issues on Github link, Forum link, or Discord
